title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message:
820-2914-B, it has some issue with charging,
when I plug the MagSafe it charges the battery consuming 2.9A directly after it decreases the amper consumption to 1.2A
I think it has an issue with the Amperomter sensor after it charges the battery slowly.

u7000 replaced
battery SDA/SCL 0.530 diode mode/ 3.4V


who to start this troubleshooting?

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message:
Is your board 2914, or 2915?
Did you try known good battery?
Original Magsafe 1 85W charger?

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message: I'm not an expert, but from my experience this is usually caused by a bad aftermarket battery. Change U7000 and Q7055 at once and never connect that bad battery again.

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message:
Sorry for being late on this..
it is 2915
Resistance between pin 19/20 9.2omh
27/28 26ohm

I didn't replace u7000, it is a new board but it has the same issue.

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message: Try KNOWN GOOD battery, as you can waste time for nothing...

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message: I tested a good battery the same problem, it charge the battery with 0.5amp

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message:
When battery voltage increases, charging current decreases, this is normal behaviour.
Can you fully charge the battery?

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message:
the battery voltage 10.8v
it shows on the system 8%

I put this battery on other known good board it charges with 2.5amp.

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message:
For such low level yes, should charge with high current.
I was thinking you had battery almost full...

Check SMC_DCIN/BMON_ISENSE levels.

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message:
SMC_DCIN_ISENSE 0.3v oscillate to 1v
BMON_ISENSE 3v

the battery level about 50%

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message:
"BMON_ISENSE 3v"
There is your problem!

Post CHGR_BMON level and check resistance between pins 17/18 of ISL6259.

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message: 100% Q7055, you will find it is shorted right now.

title: 820-2915, slow battery charging
message:
Yes I found a broken trace on the R5422 and I repaired it 
Q7055 replaced also but I didn't found a short in it
thanks for help
